title: v.247 - New Age: Into the Abyss Patch Notes
content: Click here to read the patch notes for v.247 - New Age: Into the Abyss.

title: [Completed] Unscheduled Cash Shop, Auction, and Monster Life Server Maintenance - December 12, 2023
content: The unscheduled Cash Shop, Auction, and Monster Life server maintenance has been completed. Thank you for your patience.

title: Scheduled Game Update - December 13, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled game update on Wednesday, December 13, 2023 at 5:00 AM PST (8:00 AM EST / 2:00 PM CET / 12:00 AM AEDT Dec. 14).

title: Check Out the December 2023 Art Corner
content: Look at this month's roundup of our favorite fan art!

title: MapleStory Monster Collection HyperX Keycaps and Headset Toppers!
content: Our friends at HyperX are back with new MapleStory accessories for their HX3D line of gaming devices!

title: Community Livestream - v.247 Update Preview
content: Join Community Managers, Veeraah and Jade, in the next Community Livestream as they preview the upcoming events and contents in v.247 New Age: Into the Abyss.
